description:
Save 10% and Free Shipping at Ridge by using offer code LINUS at https://www.ridge.com/LINUS

It’s impossible to know just how many bizarre game controllers have come and gone over the years, and they’re DEFINTELY not all winners. We’ve gotten our hands on a fresh batch to try out - will find a diamond in the rough?

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1573825-i-bought-the-weirdest-gaming-controllers-ever/

title: I Bought the WEIRDEST Gaming Controllers EVER
